16          else:

23 -    def next(self): 

24          # Stop if HTTP dictates a stop. 
25          if self.mesg and self.mesg.should_close(): 
26              raise StopIteration() 
27           
28          # Discard any unread body of the previous message 
29          if self.mesg: 
30              data = self.mesg.body.read(8192) 
31              while data: 
32                  data = self.mesg.body.read(8192) 
33           
34          # Parse the next request 
35          self.mesg = self.mesg_class(self.unreader) 
36          if not self.mesg: 
37              raise StopIteration() 
38          return self.mesg
